creator: Classlist
descriptionHtml:
Classlist is the award-winning app that brings parents into the heart of their school community. In over 3,000 schools and over 40 countries.

- See who's who at school. Put a face to a name!
- Ask the parents in your child's class a question and share useful info
- Organise a parent meetup for your class and see what PTA events are coming up
- Find families nearby to share lifts with on the parent map
- Exchange items on the Marketplace and ask for recommendations

It’s safe & secure. You're in control of how much information you choose to share and what notifications you want. Classlist is fully GDPR compliant, private and secure.

It’s moderated to keep your community friendly, welcoming and useful.

It’s inclusive — easy for new parents to sign up. Designed for mums and dads. Helps everyone stay in the loop with what’s happening at school.

Download the app to join your school’s Classlist or set up Classlist for your school

With additional features to support the PTA and Class Reps:
- Arrange simple coffee mornings to major PTA events. Send invites, reminders, and track RSVPs easily in Events
- Sell tickets and take payment online
- Get out important messages to the whole school, or any class or year, quickly with Announcements
- Post to your class or year group via the Activity Feed — ideal for shorter messages
- Set up interest groups to bring parents together. Create groups to co-ordinate with your PTA team for specific events too!

“We are really liking Classlist. It’s different to social media because it’s well controlled.” —
Josephine Marsh, Head Teacher, St Joseph's Catholic Primary School, Chalfont, UK

www.classlist.com
support@classlist.com
descriptionShort: Classlist - bringing parents into the heart of their school community

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We’re excited to introduce Classbudi Video Chat! Virtual playdates, making friends with new classmates and connecting with families in your school community are now easier than ever. Classbudi creates unlimited video rooms. Recreating the kind of conversations you would have at the school gate. You can easily swop rooms and keep up with what’s happening in your community. A fantastic way of making sure new parents integrate into your school community.

Don’t forget to rate us!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We have updated our App to improve camera and file handling for posts and comments. Now you can add photos to posts, comments & replies from your camera, and attach files.

We've also fixed some smaller issues and improved the loading.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
** NEW FOR 2022/23 ** Get the latest release for iOS - It's stylish and packed full of enhanced features.
An entirely new UI based on insights from our users and a mobile-first design.
This release also covers fixes for a few teething issues related to:
- App badge notifications count clearing
- More space for longer comments
- Nicer formatting of text
- Internal links landing you in the right place
- Renaming private chat groups

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We have been working to make sure links work well; specifically public event links and invitations to Classlist links.
The counter on comments to posts has also been reviewed and updated as well as the option to add attachments to comments.
Community events - viewed from the parent-side - now offers a clearer indication of the event status and ticket sales availability with an updated UI.

descriptionShort: Classlist helps schools and families connect, collaborate and celebrate.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We have improved the list of Reps and admins (in the Parent Finder section) to make it easier to see who's class rep and send a quick message to volunteer.
On events: Parents can once again return free tickets on the mobile app. More event statuses have been added to the event detail and the community event guest list tab improved. A reported issue for payments on a specific device has been resolved.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- See who the class reps are by checking your class group members' tab from which you can also volunteer by sending a message to the ambassadors. Or, if you're in the year group, you can now navigate easily to the Reps and admins section from the members' tab.
- Join a new interest group, now ordered alpha-numerically to help you find a specific group of interest.
- Notifications give clearer information to the right people at the right time.
- Your Classlist app will load faster too.

- Arrange simple coffee mornings to major PTA events. Send invites, reminders, and track RSVPs easily in Events
- Sell tickets and take payment online
- Get out important messages to the whole school, or any class or year, quickly with Announcements
- Post to your class or year group via the Activity Feed — ideal for shorter messages
- Set up interest groups to bring parents together. Create groups to co-ordinate with your PTA team for specific events too!

“We are really liking Classlist. It’s different to social media because it’s well controlled.” —
Josephine Marsh, Head Teacher, St Joseph's Catholic Primary School, Chalfont, UK

www.classlist.com
support@classlist.com
descriptionShort: Classlist helps schools and families connect, collaborate and celebrate.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Private messages have been in focus with a number of great enhancements:
- Our emoji reactions are now available in private chat messages as well as on posts
- Long press on a message to reveal the react, reply, delete and copy message options
- Avatars distinguish group from 1:1 chats
- Messaging a seller about a listing now includes the listing details and pre-filled text to make it easier to communicate

descriptionShort: Classlist helps schools and families connect, collaborate and celebrate.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Links come with the option to open in the browser or copy for easier navigation
- Notifications make sure you're informed when somebody replies to the conversation
- Guest lists on private events link through to the individual guests so you can message each person for lifts
- Profile privacy settings are now clearer regarding who can see your address
- Receiving messages to volunteer as class rep is now easier for ambassadors to follow

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Lots of improvements to events including:
- Apple and Google Pay options are now available on event checkouts
- A quick create option has been added to the parent app create menu for community events
- Private events show more statuses to reflect your response combined with the RSVP date status
- Parents can cancel and delete private events as needed
Additionally, new admin notifications are now indicated from within in the parent app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This release offers search functionality for all main content areas of the app.
It also includes improvements to:
-viewing attachments
-@ mentions
-copy pasting
Additionally, community events benefit from:
-clearer signposting while adding guests and publishing
-the ordering of past events
-fixes to sign-ups lists on duplicated events
-distinguishing clearly between community or private events

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Lots of updates especially for events, collaboration, and emails
-Extra raffle organisers enabled
-Addresses open your device map app for directions
-Private event guests can be invited by using the interest group names
-Admins can view each others’ scheduled announcements
-Emails in general have had a face-lift with our most recent branding styles
-School profile info has greater visibility now on mobile (tap your avatar)
-Pupil gender is no longer included

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New: Classlist QR Code Guest List scanner for Classlist ticketed community events.
Event organisers can now scan and check in guests’ tickets on the door for speedier and more accurate events management. Guests can find QR codes added to their tickets on the latest version of the app, as well as available in a PDF download, or an email in the case of public guests.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: This version brings improvements to copy-pasting on mobile, and makes discovering interest groups easier with a link from the groups list to the relevant search tab.
